components.name: Fastlane CLI
components.description: Command-line interface for user interaction and workflow initiation

components.name: Processing Engine
components.description: Core backend component handling Fastfile parsing, lane execution, and task orchestration

components.name: Configuration Store
components.description: Secure storage for user-specific settings, credentials, and project configurations

components.name: External Integrations
components.description: APIs for CI/CD systems (GitHub Actions, Jenkins), App Store Connect, and cloud services

data_flows.description: User commands and configuration parameters passed to the backend for execution
Retrieves and stores sensitive credentials and project settings during lane execution
Automated workflows triggering CI/CD pipelines and cloud service operations

trust_boundaries.name: Trusted CLI Environment
trust_boundaries.description: User's local machine where CLI operates with elevated privileges

trust_boundaries.name: Trusted Backend Processing
trust_boundaries.description: Internal system processing workflows with strict access controls

trust_boundaries.name: Untrusted External Services
trust_boundaries.description: Third-party CI/CD and cloud services with potential attack vectors
